title: Android auto just stops when I'm using it with my pixel 3 never had this problem with my other phone
content:
Update the car stereo Kenwood ddx9703s, it worked longer over 1/2 an hour before it stops. then when then went back to stoping 10 to 15 after use 
I say stop I mean stop I have to unplug the phone to get the stereo working again
